synonyms: ṣaṣṭha paricchede—in the Sixth Chapter; advaita—of Advaita Ācārya; tattvera—of the truth; vicāra—consideration; advaita-ācārya—Advaita Prabhu; mahā-viṣṇu-avatāra—incarnation of Mahā-Viṣṇu.
translation: The Sixth Chapter considers the truth of Advaita Ācārya. He is an incarnation of Mahā-Viṣṇu.
